alert.note: Alert for Angelina; Nacogdoches; Rusk; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 4:20AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL DE SOTO PARISH... PANOLA...SOUTHEASTERN RUSK...NACOGDOCHES...SHELBY...ANGELINA AND WESTERN SAN AUGUSTINE COUNTIES THROUGH 515 AM CST... At 419 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Beckville to near Apple Springs. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lufkin, Nacogdoches, Carthage, Center, Diboll, Hudson, Huntington, Logansport, Tenaha, Timpson, Garrison, Beckville, Joaquin, Pinehill, Martinsville, Trawick, Pollok, Shelbyville, Melrose, and Bland Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern and northeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Angelina; Nacogdoches; Rusk; San Augustine; Shelby
